column1: * 1968 - The second day of filming J.R.R. Tolkien for the documentary Tolkien in Oxford.
* 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society.
* 1978 - William Sievert publishes the article "A Mania for Middle-earth" in the Chronicle for Higher Education.
